name: hannah-list-lab
description: Hannah's List Lab is a full-stack to-do list app built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). It features OAuth authentication for secure access and a clean, modern UI for efficient task management.

scripts.start: (cd server && npm run server) & (cd client && npm run dev)
scripts.install:all: (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install)
